name: Eastern Norway County Network
bossPosition: Chairman of the Regional Cooperation Board
goal:
The overall aim of ENCN is to:

• Further develop Eastern Norway as a sustainable and competitive region in Europe.
• Secure a balanced and sustainable development within the region through polycentric development. This will help to ease the pressure on the capital region and strengthen the rest of the territory.

Eastern Norway County Network has main focus on:
• Transport and communications
• Education, training and competence-building
* Economic Development and innovation
• European policy and cooperation
interests: Climate Action, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
ENCN holds the presidency of the Baltic Sea States Subregional Co-operation (BSSSC) for the period 2017-2019. BSSSC president is Mr. Roger Ryberg. Secretary General is Ms. Ann Irene Saeternes.

Policy areas to be followed in 2019:
Cohesion policy 2021 - 2027, Sustainable Development Goals 2030, climate and follow up of the Paris agreement, TEN-T Core Corridor Networks, Smart Specialisation, Urban Agenda, Education and Youth Policy, Circular Economy, Maritime policy - EU Strategy for the Baltic Sea Region and Sea Basin strategy in North Sea.
